Package edu.clevertec.check.service.orderprocessing.orderprocessingimpl

Class OrderProcessingImpl

java.lang.Object
edu.clevertec.check.service.impl.OrderProcessingServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
OrderProcessing
public class OrderProcessingImpl extends Object implements OrderProcessing
This class is used to create the main part of the store receipt, based on an array of strings containing conditional product purchases by the customer.
Version:
JDK 1.8
Author:
Artur Malashkov

  • Method Details

    • orderProcessingService

      public OrderProcessingImpl orderProcessingService()
      Order Processing

      This method checks the array of strings args to see if each element is filled in correctly and converts the given array of strings into a set customShoppingList of products and quantities. This method also searches for a discount card DiscountCard and its type in an array of strings. Products are searched in the class Market using the method Market.getProductFromMarketProductListById(int).

      Specified by:
      orderProcessingService in interface OrderProcessing
      Returns:
      this, an object that will initialize such fields as: discountCard, customShoppingList
      Throws:
      InvalidProduct - if the format of the type and quantity of the product is incorrectly specified in line args
      InvalidCardName - If the card name does not match mastercard or goldcard in any case
      InvalidProductQuantity - if the quantity of the product exceeds the store's stock of 9999 the quantity of any product
      InvalidNumberCard - if the number of digits in the card number is less than or greater than 5
      See Also:
      • DiscountCard
      • Product

    • formationOfCheck

      public void formationOfCheck()
      Formation of a check

      Formation of the main body of the check, including such indicators as: quantity, price, description, cost, total cost. Based on the products ordered from the store and the type of discount card.

      Specified by:
      formationOfCheck in interface OrderProcessing
      Throws:
      EmptyCustomShoppingList - if the Cart could not be found
